title: John Lee (footballer, born 1889)
text:
John Charles Lee was an English <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="outside%20left">outside left</a> who played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Clapton%20Orient%20F.C.">Clapton Orient</a>.
Personal life.
Lee served as a <a href="Private%20%28rank%29">private</a> in the <a href="British%20Army%20during%20World%20War%20I">British Army</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>.
